title: Graphene oxide-based probe for detecting deltamethrin and emamectin benzoate pesticides in agricultural run-off
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, 10,2162-2176
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00328D, Paper
Suryyia Manzoor, Muhammad Hayat, Hina Raza, Noureddine Elboughdiri, Muhammad Imran Khan, Zeeshan Ali, Ayesha Javed, Nadeem Raza, Fahad Abdulaziz, Abdallah Shanableh
Insecticides adversely affect aquatic ecosystems due to prolonged exposure, persistent nature, and bioaccumulation.
